source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View aie_document_data is created

%%sql
-- Build aie_document_data table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW aie_document_data_new

     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.documentid IS NULL
        THEN T3.CaseReference
        ELSE NULL
    END                             AS AIEDocumentDataID,
    T1.documentid	                AS DocumentID,
    T1.caseref	                    AS CaseReference,
    T1.documentreference	        AS DocumentReference,
    T1.version	                    AS Version,
    T1.examinationrefno	            AS ExaminationRefNo,
    T1.filename	                    AS FileName,
    T1.originalfilename	            AS OriginalFileName,
    T1.size	                        AS Size,
    T1.mime	                        AS Mime,
    T1.documenturi	                AS DocumentURI,
    T1.path	                        AS Path,
    T1.viruscheckstatus	            AS VirusCheckStatus,
    T1.filemd5	                    AS FileMD5,
    T1.datecreated	                AS DateCreated,
    T1.lastmodified	                AS LastModified,
    T1.casetype	                    AS CaseType,
    T1.documentstatus	            AS DocumentStatus,
    T1.redactedstatus	            AS RedactedStatus,
    T1.publishedstatus	            AS PublishedStatus,
    T1.datepublished	            AS DatePublished,
    T1.documenttype	                AS DocumentType	,
    T1.securityclassification       AS SecurityClassification,
    T1.sourcesystem	                AS SourceSystem,
    T1.origin	                    AS Origin,
    T1.owner	                    AS Owner,
    T1.author	                    AS Author,
    T1.representative	            AS Representative,
    T1.description	                AS Description,
    T1.stage	                    AS Stage,
    T1.filter1	                    AS Filter1,
    T1.filter2	                    AS Filter2,
    "0"                             AS Migrated,
    "Horizon"                       AS ODTSourceSystem,
    T2.SourceSystemID               AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.documentid,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.caseref,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.documentreference,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.version,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.examinationrefno,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.filename,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.originalfilename,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.size,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.mime,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.documenturi,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.path,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.viruscheckstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.filemd5,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.datecreated,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lastmodified,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.casetype,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.documentstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.redactedstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.publishedstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.datepublished,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.documenttype,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.securityclassification,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.sourcesystem,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.origin,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.owner,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.author,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.representative,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.description,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.stage	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.filter1,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.filter2,'.')
        ))                          AS RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    'Y'                             AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.aie_document_data T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON "DocumentTree" = T2.Description AND 
        T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data T3 
    ON T1.documentid = T3.DocumentID AND 
        T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    (CASE
        WHEN T1.caseref = T3.CaseReference AND md5(
            concat(
                IFNULL(T1.documentid	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.caseref	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.documentreference	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.version	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.examinationrefno	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.filename	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.originalfilename	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.size	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.mime	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.documenturi	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.path	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.viruscheckstatus	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.filemd5	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.datecreated	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.lastmodified	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.casetype	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.documentstatus	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.redactedstatus	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.publishedstatus	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.datepublished	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.documenttype	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.securityclassification	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.sourcesystem	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.origin	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.owner	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.author	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.representative	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.description	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.stage	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.filter1	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.filter2	,'.')
                
            )) <> T3.RowID  -- same record, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.DocumentID IS NULL -- new record
        THEN 'Y'
    ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.documentid IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.aie_document_data)

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_all_appeals_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View aie_document_data_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW aie_document_data_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 
SELECT 
    AIEDocumentDataID	,
    DocumentID	,
    CaseReference	,
    DocumentReference	,
    Version	,
    ExaminationRefNo	,
    FileName	,
    OriginalFileName	,
    Size	,
    Mime	,
    DocumentURI	,
    Path	,
    VirusCheckStatus	,
    FileMD5	,
    DateCreated	,
    LastModified	,
    CaseType	,
    DocumentStatus	,
    RedactedStatus	,
    PublishedStatus	,
    DatePublished	,
    DocumentType	,
    SecurityClassification	,
    SourceSystem	,
    Origin	,
    Owner	,
    Author	,
    Representative	,
    Description	,
    Stage	,
    Filter1	,
    Filter2	,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    

From aie_document_data_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'
SELECT
    AIEDocumentDataID	,
    DocumentID	,
    CaseReference	,
    DocumentReference	,
    Version	,
    ExaminationRefNo	,
    FileName	,
    OriginalFileName	,
    Size	,
    Mime	,
    DocumentURI	,
    Path	,
    VirusCheckStatus	,
    FileMD5	,
    DateCreated	,
    LastModified	,
    CaseType	,
    DocumentStatus	,
    RedactedStatus	,
    PublishedStatus	,
    DatePublished	,
    DocumentType	,
    SecurityClassification	,
    SourceSystem	,
    Origin	,
    Owner	,
    Author	,
    Representative	,
    Description	,
    Stage	,
    Filter1	,
    Filter2	,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data
WHERE DocumentID IN (SELECT DocumentID FROM aie_document_data_new WHERE AIEDocumentDataID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM aie_document_data_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW aie_document_data_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    
    AIEDocumentDataID	,
    DocumentID	,
    CaseReference	,
    DocumentReference	,
    Version	,
    ExaminationRefNo	,
    FileName	,
    OriginalFileName	,
    Size	,
    Mime	,
    DocumentURI	,
    Path	,
    VirusCheckStatus	,
    FileMD5	,
    DateCreated	,
    LastModified	,
    CaseType	,
    DocumentStatus	,
    RedactedStatus	,
    PublishedStatus	,
    DatePublished	,
    DocumentType	,
    SecurityClassification	,
    SourceSystem	,
    Origin	,
    Owner	,
    Author	,
    Representative	,
    Description	,
    Stage	,
    Filter1	,
    Filter2	,
    
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM aie_document_data_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View aie_document_data_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. AllAppealsID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data AS Target
USING aie_document_data_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.DocumentID = Target.DocumentID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows

WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (
        AIEDocumentDataID	,
        DocumentID	,
        CaseReference	,
        DocumentReference	,
        Version	,
        ExaminationRefNo	,
        FileName	,
        OriginalFileName	,
        Size	,
        Mime	,
        DocumentURI	,
        Path	,
        VirusCheckStatus	,
        FileMD5	,
        DateCreated	,
        LastModified	,
        CaseType	,
        DocumentStatus	,
        RedactedStatus	,
        PublishedStatus	,
        DatePublished	,
        DocumentType	,
        SecurityClassification	,
        SourceSystem	,
        Origin	,
        Owner	,
        Author	,
        Representative	,
        Description	,
        Stage	,
        Filter1	,
        Filter2	,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)
    VALUES (
        Source.AIEDocumentDataID	,
        Source.DocumentID	,
        Source.CaseReference	,
        Source.DocumentReference	,
        Source.Version	,
        Source.ExaminationRefNo	,
        Source.FileName	,
        Source.OriginalFileName	,
        Source.Size	,
        Source.Mime	,
        Source.DocumentURI	,
        Source.Path	,
        Source.VirusCheckStatus	,
        Source.FileMD5	,
        Source.DateCreated	,
        Source.LastModified	,
        Source.CaseType	,
        Source.DocumentStatus	,
        Source.RedactedStatus	,
        Source.PublishedStatus	,
        Source.DatePublished	,
        Source.DocumentType	,
        Source.SecurityClassification	,
        Source.SourceSystem	,
        Source.Origin	,
        Source.Owner	,
        Source.Author	,
        Source.Representative	,
        Source.Description	,
        Source.Stage	,
        Source.Filter1	,
        Source.Filter2	,
        Source.SourceSystemID,
        Source.IngestionDate,
        Source.ValidTo,
        Source.RowID,
        Source.IsActive)

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new aie_document_data

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CaseReference NULLS LAST) AS AIEDocumentDataID,
    DocumentID	,
    CaseReference	,
    DocumentReference	,
    Version	,
    ExaminationRefNo	,
    FileName	,
    OriginalFileName	,
    Size	,
    Mime	,
    DocumentURI	,
    Path	,
    VirusCheckStatus	,
    FileMD5	,
    DateCreated	,
    LastModified	,
    CaseType	,
    DocumentStatus	,
    RedactedStatus	,
    PublishedStatus	,
    DatePublished	,
    DocumentType	,
    SecurityClassification	,
    SourceSystem	,
    Origin	,
    Owner	,
    Author	,
    Representative	,
    Description	,
    Stage	,
    Filter1	,
    Filter2	,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data;
